thread.title: ST BERNARD III PARADE
thread.title_full: Hodges Badge Company, Inc reviewed by ST BERNARD III PARADE

author: ST BERNARD III PARADE
title: ST BERNARD III PARADE
text: We ordered some medallions with a color ribbon as well as rhinestones around the medallion and they have arrived and they are tremendous. Great value, quick service and will use again very soon. I recommend this company, A+.
